trans-unit.source: Provides a common implementation of members for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox" /> classes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class provides implementations of common elements for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类提供的常见元素实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 以下属性是数据绑定的用户的主要关注事项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class as implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是完成的应用程序，演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类实现了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类。

trans-unit.source: The example loads an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and the list box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例加载<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>和列表框。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在列表框中选择一个项时，所选的值用于返回与所选的项关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> class.
Gets a value indicating whether the list enables selection of list items.
<see langword="true" /> if the list enables list item selection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果列表启用列表项选择;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> associated with this control.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />与此控件关联。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataManager%2A> property is valid if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataManager%2A>属性才有效如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: If this is not a data-bound control, the default is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这不是数据绑定控件，则默认将`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> interfaces, such as a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> or an <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />或<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" />接口，如<see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />或<see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法以填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以将对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also add objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> properties to fill the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以添加到对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>属性以填充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>属性设置，则用户不能修改项集合。

trans-unit.source: If setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property causes the data source to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>属性会导致数据源，若要更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If setting this property causes the data member to change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性将导致数据成员，若要更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> to `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>到`null`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>设置为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class as implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是完成的应用程序，演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类实现了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类。

trans-unit.source: The example loads an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and the list box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例加载<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>和列表框。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在列表框中选择一个项时，所选的值用于返回与所选的项关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> interfaces.
Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" /> changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ListControl1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to display for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> specifying the name of an object property that is contained in the collection specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />在指定的集合中指定的对象属性包含名称<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" />属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: The controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> can display diverse types of objects.
trans-unit.target: 继承控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>可以显示不同类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性上不存在该对象或值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>为空字符串 ("")，该对象的结果`ToString`改为显示方法。

trans-unit.source: If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 如果不设置新的显示成员，则会保持设置的上一个显示成员。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class as implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是完成的应用程序，演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类实现了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类。

trans-unit.source: The example loads an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and the list box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例加载<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>和列表框。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在列表框中选择一个项时，所选的值用于返回与所选的项关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ListControl1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item, if the item is a property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> class.
The object the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item is bound to.
Retrieves the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item, if it is a property of an object, given the item.
The filtered object.
The object the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item is bound to.
The property name of the item the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> is bound to.
Returns the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" /> item, if it is a property of an object given the item and the property name.
The filtered object.
Occurs when the control is bound to a data value.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> event is raised before each visible item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> is formatted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format>引发事件的每个可见项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>设置的格式。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理此事件，可以访问要通过此列表项，显示的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControlConvertEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ListControl1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> that provides custom formatting behavior.
The <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> implementation that provides custom formatting behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" />提供自定义格式设置行为的实现。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo%2A> property will override the default formatting behavior, which uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo%2A>属性将覆盖默认格式设置行为，它使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatInfo" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format-specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
The string of format-specifier characters that indicates how a value is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 由格式说明符字符组成的字符串，指示如何显示值。

trans-unit.source: The format string used must follow standard [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] format specifications.
trans-unit.target: 使用的格式字符串必须遵循标准[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的格式规范。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Formatting Types in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatString" /> property changes
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatStringChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatStringChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatStringChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ListControl1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormatStringChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether formatting is applied to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.
<see langword="true" /> if formatting of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果格式设置的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" />属性是启用; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> property to `true` causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format> event to be raised for each visible member of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>属性`true`导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.Format>的每个可见成员中引发的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> are related as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>相关，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>将不能设置为-1 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>为空白。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>将设置为-1 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>为空白。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The object from which to get the contents to display.
Returns the text representation of the specified item.

If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property is not specified, the value returned by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.GetItemText(System.Object)" /> is the value of the item's <see langword="ToString" /> method.

Otherwise, the method returns the string value of the member specified in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember" /> property for the object specified in the <paramref name="item" /> parameter.
One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />.
Handles special input keys, such as PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, HOME, END, and so on.

<see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter specifies the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.End" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Home" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.PageUp" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.PageDown" /> key; <see langword="false" /> if the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter specifies <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Alt" />.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged" /> event.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item whose data to refresh.
When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the data of the object at the specified index with the contents of the data source.
When overridden in a derived class, resynchronizes the item data with the contents of the data source.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item.
A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果未选定任何项，则返回值为负一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the member property specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" /> property.
An object containing the value of the member of the data source specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含指定的数据源的成员的值的对象<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" />属性。

trans-unit.source: If a property is not specified in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果在不指定属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>返回的结果`ToString`对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> are related as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>相关，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will not be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>将不能设置为-1 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>为空白。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> will be set to -1 when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> is blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.FormattingEnabled%2A>是`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>将设置为-1 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>为空白。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> returning the value of the property specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>返回指定的属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此代码摘自中所示的示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类概述。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> for the whole code listing.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>为完整的代码清单。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is <see langword="null" /> or the empty string ("").
Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class as implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是完成的应用程序，演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类实现了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类。

trans-unit.source: The example loads an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and the list box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例加载<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>和列表框。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> event to fill in a text box when the user selects an item in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>事件以填充在文本框中，当用户在列表框中选择一个项。

trans-unit.source: The text box is filled with the data associated with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 与所选项目相关联的数据填充文本框。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object.
The object.
When overridden in a derived class, sets the object with the specified index in the derived class.
An array of items.
When overridden in a derived class, sets the specified array of objects in a collection in the derived class.
Gets or sets the path of the property to use as the actual value for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl" />.

A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing a single property name of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" /> property value, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to a property name of the final data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示单个属性名称的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" />属性值或可解析为最终的数据绑定对象的属性名称的句点分隔属性名称的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: Specify the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property in cases where you bind data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>在将数据绑定的情况下的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>属性通过将属性设置为空字符串 ("") 或`null`。

trans-unit.source: Setting a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 设置新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>属性引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows loading the data into an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A> to a property of the object in the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示将数据加载到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>和设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember%2A>列表中对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified property path cannot be resolved through the object specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource" /> property.
Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMember" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ListControl1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.ValueMemberChanged>事件。
